reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting the national rollout of provincial level climate legislation in China

description.narrative: The project is designed to refine draft climate legislation in China by drawing on international best practice and feeding in key findings from four provinces that already have climate regulation - Jiangsu, Hubei, Shijiazhuang and Nanchang. The project will involve seminars in these four provinces to share practices and experience, plus the submission to the Chinese government of a final report that advises on national and provincial policy.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
